>>== MODE ==>>
citation
<<== MODE ==<<


>>== RESULT ==>>
Ibid. :: ALT
<<== RESULT ==<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <macro name="main-render">
    <choose>
      <if variable="edition" match="none">
        <text term="ibid"/>
      </if>
    </choose>
  </macro>
  <macro name="main-not-render">
    <choose>
      <if variable="edition" match="any">
        <text term="ibid"/>
      </if>
    </choose>
  </macro>
  <macro name="alternative">
    <text value="ALT"/>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout>
       <group delimiter=" :: ">
         <text macro="main-render" alternative-macro="alternative"/>
         <text macro="main-not-render" alternative-macro="alternative"/>
       </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "title": "Hello",
        "type": "book"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
